name: Boost Jump
description:
Boost Jump is a short 3D platformer prototype game that I developed alone over about 6 months. The basic movement mechanics are heavily inspired by the 3D Mario games (Super Mario 64, Super Mario Sunshine, etc.). The name Boost Jump comes from the ability to store up energy while running, colliding, etc., and use that energy to make other jumps stronger or perform a Boost Jump in the air.

You can email me with any questions/comments/issues at boostjumpgame@gmail.com
